value.name: C (C11 default) + C89/C99/C17/C23 variants
value.rationale: Low-dependency native source target family; good baseline for hosted + embedded environments.

value.name: Rust (edition 2021)
value.rationale: Strong determinism story at the source level; good performance and safety; ecosystem-standard packaging.

value.name: Go
value.rationale: Fast builds, simple deployment model; good for operational tooling and services.

value.name: Haskell
value.rationale: Pure functional target family; useful for testing semantic lowering and normalization properties.

value.name: Erlang + Elixir (BEAM)
value.rationale: Concurrency/message-passing semantics; useful for distributed/runtime-focused variants.

value.name: Prolog
value.rationale: Logic programming target family; good for declarative semantics and search.

value.name: Datalog
value.rationale: Declarative fixed-point semantics; good for IR analyses and constraint-style derivations.

value.name: ASP (clingo-flavored)
value.rationale: Non-monotonic reasoning target family; good for policy/rules encodings.

value.name: MiniZinc
value.rationale: Constraint modeling target; good for optimization/constraint backends.
